itemDescription: South African rugby union footballer, cricketer and politician (1920-1974)

wikipedia_page.main: John Oswald "Ossie" Newton-Thompson  (2 December 1920 – 3 April 1974) was a South African sportsman and politician. He played international rugby union for England and was also a first-class cricketer. From 1961 until his death in 1974, Newton-Thompson was a member of the South African parliament.
